scripts.build:lib: NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf build && mkdir build && npx babel ./src/lib --out-dir ./build --ignore "**/*.test.js,**/*.examples.md,favicon.ico" --copy-files
scripts.publish:lib: yarn build:lib && cp package.json build && cp README.md build && cd ./build && yarn publish --access public
scripts.build:styleg: rm -rf build && npx styleguidist build --config src/config/styleguide.config.js
scripts.publish:styleg: yarn build:styleg && aws s3 sync ./build s3://mercury.ivory.io --profile default
